text: Alhaji Momodo Njie (30 March 1948 – 19 July 2020), also known as Biri Biri, was a Gambian footballer. He played as a right winger. He known for playing for Sevilla FC in Spain and Herfølge Boldklub in Denmark. From 1963 to 1987, he played for the national team. Biri died on 19 July 2020, aged 72, in Dakar, Senegal. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2020 deaths Category:African footballers Category:Derby County F.C. players Category:Gambian people
title: Biri Biri
